sentences.chinese: 秋，衡山雨雹，大者五寸，深者二尺。
sentences.literal: Autumn, Hengshan rained hail, large ones five inches, deep ones two feet.
Jupiter moved retrograde in Heavenly Court center.

sentences.chinese: 置南陵及內史、祋祤為縣。
sentences.literal: Established Nanling and also Neishi and Qirong as counties.
Third year first month yisi, granted amnesty to all under Heaven.

sentences.chinese: 天火燔雒陽東宮大殿城室。
sentences.literal: Heavenly fire burned Luoyang Eastern Palace great hall city chambers.

sentences.chinese: 吳王濞、楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠反，發兵西鄉。
sentences.literal: King Bi of Wu, King Wu of Chu, King Sui of Zhao, King Ang of Jiaoxi, King Pi Guang of Jinan, King Xian of Zichuan, King Xiong Qu of Jiaodong rebelled, sent troops west toward.

sentences.chinese: 天子為誅晁錯，遣袁盎諭告，不止，遂西圍梁。
sentences.literal: Son of Heaven to execute Chao Cuo, sent Yuan Ang to admonish inform, did not stop, consequently west besieged Liang.

sentences.chinese: 上乃遣大將軍竇嬰、太尉周亞夫將兵誅之。
sentences.literal: Emperor then sent Grand General Dou Ying, Grand Commandant Zhou Yafu to lead troops execute them.

sentences.chinese: 赦亡軍及楚元王子藝等與謀反者。
sentences.literal: Granted amnesty to deserters and Chu Yuan Wang's son Yi and others who participated in rebellion.

sentences.chinese: 封大將軍竇嬰為魏其侯。
sentences.literal: Enfeoffed Grand General Dou Ying as Marquis of Weiqi.

sentences.chinese: 立楚元王子平陸侯禮為楚王。
sentences.literal: Installed Chu Yuan Wang's son Ping Lu Hou Li as King of Chu.
